metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5851 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The free_options function in options_manager.c in mp3splt 2.6.2 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference andcrash) via a crafted file.  NOTE: this typically has no risk; this crash ofthis command-line program has no further consequences for availability.

criterions.comment: mp3splt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
